Lightning SDK

Texture clipping

enableClipping(x, y, w, h)

textureclipping parameters

NameTypeDefaultDescription
xInteger0
yInteger0
wInteger0
hInteger0

textureclipping methods

NameParametersDescription
enableClippingx, y, w, hShorthand for setting clipping
disableClippingDisables active clipping

Live Demo

class TextureDemo extends lng.Application {
    static _template() {
        return {
            MyTexture: {
                src: '/Lightning/img/LngDocs_LilLightningIdle.png', texture: {x: 100, y: 100, w: 100, h: 200}
            }
        }
    };
}

const options = {
    stage: {
        w: 600,
        h: 600,
        clearColor: 0x00000000,
        canvas2d: false,
        useImageWorker: false,
    },
    debug: true,
};

const app = new TextureDemo(options);
document.body.appendChild(app.stage.getCanvas());
